<h1 align="center">
  Welcome to my first Gatsby website</h1>
    <p>This is a simple site that represented the menu of recipes. created by Gatsby Reactjs and the data flow from the Contentful CMS. I used GraphQL to consume all the Contentful data and Styled-Components to render style Contentful, GraphQl and Styled-Component</p>

[Demo](https://gatsby-simple-website.netlify.app/)

## Usage

gatsby develop
